item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: Hah! You think *that's* old? I had (*still* have it, I think...) one of the <a href="http://oldcomputers.net/zx80.html" rel="nofollow">ZX-80's</a>, although I eventually upgraded to the 1000. (And of course I also had the 16 <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kibibyte" rel="nofollow">kiB</a> memory expansion.)
item.content:encoded: Hah! You think *that’s* old? I had (*still* have it, I think…) one of the ZX-80’s, although I eventually upgraded to the 1000. (And of course I also had the 16 kiB memory expansion.)
